/*  */
typedef struct {
    int value;          //
    struct process *L;  //
} semaphore;
/* wait() */
void wait (semaphore S) {
    S.value--;
    if (S.value < 0) {
        block(S.L);
    }
}
/* signal() */
void signal(semaphore S) {
    S.value++;
    if (S.value <= 0) {
        wakeup(S.L);
    }
}
    • n

semaphore mutex = 1;    //buffer
semaphore empty = n;    //buffer
semaphore full = 0;     //buffer
producer() {
    while (1) {
        produce a product;
        P(empty);   //
        P(mutex);
        put the product to buffer;
        V(mutex);
        V(full);
    }
}
consumer() {
    while (1) {
        P(full);    //
        P(mutex);
        take a product from buffer;
        V(mutex);
        V(empty);
        consume the product;
    }
}

2

monitor ProducerConsumer 
    condition full, empty;      //
    int count = 0;              //
    void insert(Item item) {    //
        if (count == N) {       //
            wait(full);
        }
        count++;
        insert_item(item);
        if (count == 1) {       //
            signal(empty);
        }
    }
    Item remove() {             //
        if (count == 0) {       //
            wait(empty);
        }
        count--;
        if (count == N - 1) {   //
            signal(full);
        }
        return remove_item();
    }
end monitor;

producer() {
    while (1) {
        item = produce a product;
        ProducerConsumer.insert(item);
    }
}

consumer() {
    while (1) {
        item = ProducerConsumer.remove();
        consume item;
    }
}

#include <pthread.h>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>

#define NUMBER_OF_THREADS 10

void *print_hello_world(vvoid *tid){
  /*  */
  printf("Hello World. Greetings from thread %d\n",tid);
  pthread_exit(NULL);
}

int main(int argc,char *argv[]){
  /*  10  */
  pthread_t threads[NUMBER_OF_THREADS];
  int status,i;

  for(int i = 0;i < NUMBER_OF_THREADS;i++){
    printf("Main here. Creating thread %d\n",i);
    status = pthread_create(&threads[i], NULL, print_hello_world, (void *)i);

    if(status != 0){
      printf("Oops. pthread_create returned error code %d\n",status);
      exit(-1);
    }
  }
  exit(NULL);
}

void leave_region(int process){

monitor ProducerConsumer
        condition full,empty;
        integer count;

        procedure insert(item:integer);
        begin
                if count = N then wait(full);
                insert_item(item);
                count := count + 1;
                if count = 1 then signal(empty);
        end;

        function remove:integer;
        begin
                if count = 0 then wait(empty);
                remove = remove_item;
                count := count - 1;
                if count = N - 1 then signal(full);
        end;

        count := 0;
end monitor;

procedure producer;
begin
            while true do
      begin 
                  item = produce_item;
                  ProducerConsumer.insert(item);
      end
end;

procedure consumer;
begin 
            while true do
            begin
                        item = ProducerConsumer.remove;
                        consume_item(item);
            end

monitor ProducerConsumer
        condition full,empty;
        integer count;

        procedure insert(item:integer);
        begin
                if count = N then wait(full);
                insert_item(item);
                count := count + 1;
                if count = 1 then signal(empty);
        end;

        function remove:integer;
        begin
                if count = 0 then wait(empty);
                remove = remove_item;
                count := count - 1;
                if count = N - 1 then signal(full);
        end;

        count := 0;
end monitor;

procedure producer;
begin
            while true do
      begin 
                  item = produce_item;
                  ProducerConsumer.insert(item);
      end
end;

procedure consumer;
begin 
            while true do
            begin
                        item = ProducerConsumer.remove;
                        consume_item(item);
            end
end;

    private synchronized void insert(int val){
      if(count == N){
        //

      //

    private synchronized void remove(int val){
      int val;
      if(count == 0){
        // 
        go_to_sleep();                                                
      }
      // 
      val = buffer[lo];                
      // 
      lo = (lo + 1) % N;                    
      //  1 
      count = count - 1;                                            
      if(count = N - 1){
        // 
        notify();                                                            
      }
      return val;
    }

      try{
